com.rakuten.rmp.mobile.iab

Class ByteBufferBackedVendorConsent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rakuten.rmp.mobile.iab.ByteBufferBackedVendorConsent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VendorConsent

    public class ByteBufferBackedVendorConsent
extends java.lang.Object
implements VendorConsent
    Implementation of VendorConsent. This implementation uses byte buffer (wrapped with Bits) as a storage of consent string values and parses individual fields on demand. This should work well in environment where vendor consent string is decoded, couple of isPurposeAllowed()/isVendorAllowed() calls are made and then value of the consent is discarded. In the environment where decoded consent string is kept for longer time with numerous isPurposeAllowed()/isVendorAllowed() calls a different implementation may be needed that would cache results of those calls.
